attributes.action: The outrageous bias of BBC  licence fee needs to go so people have that choice
attributes.additional_details: Having watched news 24 , BBC 6 oclock news , Question time and news night the way they always talk over Brexit contributors yet give the floor to remain speakers too give their views unhindered is always quite stark .It never used to be this way .The BBC a great institution had a chance here to show it's good offices and to be a good unbiased umpire , it did from the start ride a certain horse .
attributes.background: During the whole Brexit process the BBC on all channels has consistently showed a flagrant bias against  Brexit  and has clearly favoured  remain The idea of being  fair clearly did not sit well with them .So for those who have that feeling about it we need the choice of not paying for tv licence

rejection.details:
The BBC is already required to deliver impartial news by the "Royal Charter for the continuance of the British Broadcasting Corporation" and the "Agreement Between Her Majesty’s Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport and the British Broadcasting Corporation". It is therefore unclear what further action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In any case, we would not be able to accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. If you would like to submit a complaint about a BBC program, you can do so using the link below:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/ 

You might also like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231342
